cnbc.title: Armed man killed by authorities trying to enter Trump Mar-a-Lago club
cnbc.summary: President Donald Trump, who narrowly avoided being assassinated in 2024, was not at Mar-a-Lago when the man was killed.

cnbc.title: DHS abruptly reverses suspension of TSA PreCheck
cnbc.summary: The TSA said its PreCheck airport screening lanes are operational, hours after the DHS said the faster security checkpoint services would be paused.

cnbc.title: Trump demands Netflix fire Susan Rice as DOJ probes Warner deal
cnbc.summary: Rice argued during a podcast last week that "it is not going to end well" for corporations, news organizations, and law firms that "bent the knee" to Trump.

cnbc.title: Blizzard snarls air travel along U.S. East Coast as airlines cancel thousands of flights
cnbc.summary: American, Delta, JetBlue, United and others waived change and cancellation fees ahead of another massive winter storm.

cnbc.title: U.S. importers still paying Trump's illegal tariffs even after Supreme Court ruling
cnbc.summary: Billions in U.S. cargo are still being slapped with Trump's "reciprocal" tariffs even after being struck down by the Supreme Court ruling.

cnbc.title: The world's largest energy lender has a new head: Here's how it could shape U.S. policy
cnbc.summary: Gregory Beard heads the Office of Energy Dominance Financing, which has nearly $300 billion in lending authority. These are his energy priorities.

cnbc.title: Trump to hike global tariffs to 15% from 10%, 'effective immediately'
cnbc.summary: Trump also warned: "During the next short number of months, the Trump Administration will determine and issue the new and legally permissible Tariffs."

cnbc.title: As American Girl turns 40, Mattel grapples with bringing dolls into a new era
cnbc.summary: American Girl marks its 40th anniversary after five quarters of sales growth, but revenue remains far below its peak as Mattel faces industry pressures.

cnbc.title: Under mounting toy pressures, Hasbro has a secret sauce that Mattel hasn't matched
cnbc.summary: Hasbro's secret weapon has been its Wizards of the Coast division, which includes Dungeons & Dragons, Magic: The Gathering and the company's digital games.

cnbc.title: Five key takeaways from the Supreme Court's landmark decision against Trump's tariffs
cnbc.summary: What's far less certain is the longer-reaching impacts as the economy and markets again adjust to a changing landscape.
